main event: An unidentified aerial object, round and saucer-shaped, was observed over Passaic, New Jersey on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50 feet in diameter and was observed for about 10 minutes., Several witnesses reported seeing the object which hovered before accelerating out of sight., The photographs were allegedly taken by two men but were never proven to be a hoax., Concerns were raised about the authenticity of the photographs due to the object appearing larger than expected., The reporting officer was an Intelligence Officer and the report is associated with Project Blue Book.
witness description: several other witnesses observed the object
